Big congratulations on solving my problem, and thanks!

content: You are very welcome. Threaded has been the default since 2022, welcomed by some, cursed by others. You can change the default for any NEW folders at settings>appearance, but changing existing folders is a manual process.

content:
Which version of Thunderbird do you have?

Does the second account have a "junk" folder?

The server usually creates and controls spam folders. Your second account may have one that is not being shown. Right click on the account name in the folder pane, select "Subscribe", and see if a spam folder appears in the list of folders to subscribe to. If it's there but not checked, check it.

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content:
Heidi said
Thunderbird says that my email address, password or configuration are incorrect and that it cannot log in to the server, even though I can log in to the Vodafone server via Mozilla Firefox. What can I do?

First, disable the account hub in Settings/General, then add the account from ≡ - New Account - Email. Enter the settings given here:

https://www.vodafone.de/hilfe/vodafone-e-mail-cloud.html?tab=servereinstellungen

Disable a VPN if present.

content:
Thuderbird zabudnuté HLAVNÉ heslo k Thunderbirdu: Heslo pre softvérové zabezpečenie ste si museli sami nastaviť. Pokiaľ sa žiadosť stále zobrazuje, tak sa to dá rozchodiť RESETOVANÍM HESLA k Thunderbirdu. Resetovanie ale vymaže všetky uložené heslá v Thunderbirde. Je to preto, aby nedošlo k ľahkému získaniu ďalších hesiel neoprávnenou osobou. Pred týmto úkonom si vypíšte na papier všetky hesla z Thunderbirdu: http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/11/12/thunderbird_hesla.jpg a potom http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/11/12/thunderbird_hesla_zobrazit.jpg a potom http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/11/12/Thunderbird_hesla3.jpg a tu ich máš zapísané.

Resetovanie hesla vykonajte takto: Otvorte ponuku "Nástroje/Chybová konzola" (CTRL+SHIFT+J) a do políčka "Kód:" vložte nasledujúci kód: openDialog("chrome://pippki/content/resetpassword.xul") Kliknite na "Vyhodnotiť" a potom sa otvorí dialógové okno pre odstránenie hlavného hesla. http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/01/09/Thunderbird_chybova_konzola2.jpg
creator: Ansamb

content:
Ansam napsal(a)
"Nástroje/Chybová konzola" (CTRL+SHIFT+J) a do políčka "Kód:" vložte nasledujúci kód: openDialog("chrome://pippki/content/resetpassword.xul") Kliknite na "Vyhodnotiť" a potom sa otvorí dialógové okno pre odstránenie hlavného hesla.
  • Ten návod je zastaralý. V novějších verzích Thunderbirdu už chybová konzola neobsahuje pole „Kód“, do kterého by šlo něco vkládat.

Postup je tento: zavři Thunderbird, spusť ho znovu a v nabídce otevři nastavení ochrany hesel. Zvol možnost změnit nebo odebrat hlavní heslo. Pokud ho neznáš, Thunderbird nabídne jeho odstranění. Poté bude nutné znovu zadat hesla ke všem poštovním účtům. Původní Hesla se samozřejmě vymažou.

creator: rednoise

content:
Thunderbird is what is called an "e-mail client". E-mail clients provide a way to access messages in e-mail accounts that are hosted on a server and to send and retrieve messages through and from those accounts. It does not replace those accounts. There is no such thing (yet) as a Thunderbird e-mail address. You can use Thunderbird in place of whatever you use to access your gmail account, but you would still be using your gmail account in Thunderbird. The only way to escape Google completely is to get an e-mail account from someone else, e.g., Microsoft, Yahoo, Apple, Fastmail, or your internet service provider. Then you could use Thunderbird with that account.

Mozilla is the organization that makes Thunderbird and Firefox. Firefox is a web browser like Chrome and Safari. It is not relevant in a discussion about e-mail.
creator: mozilla98

content:
Rick said
Mozilla is the organization that makes Thunderbird and Firefox. Firefox is a web browser like Chrome and Safari. It is not relevant in a discussion about e-mail.

Mozilla Foundation is the non-profit which has several initiatives and projects, two of which are subsidiaries owned by the Foundation:

  • Mozilla Corporation makes Firefox
  • MZLA Technologies makes Thunderbird (sometimes referred to as Thunderbird Project)

And it gets confusing because a) people think "Mozilla" is one organization (it is several) and b) they share some of the same web space at https://www.mozilla.org/, including support at https://support.mozilla.org/
creator: wsmwk

content: Thanks for the clarification, Wayne.
